title: Zeekly tech guest-post blog site with structured layout and post-hero CTA button

requirements.text: Create a modern, clean, professional landing page for “Zeekly” with a strong tech-oriented visual identity, using a minimal layout, clear typography, and a structured blog format suitable for a technology-focused guest post platform.

quotes: The website name is Zeekly, and it will be a technology-focused guest post platform... The design should look modern, clean, and professional, with a strong tech-oriented visual identity. Use a minimal layout, clear typography, and a structured blog format suitable for guest posting.

acceptanceCriteria: Homepage includes a hero section introducing Zeekly as a technology-focused guest post/blog platform
Visual design is consistent across the page: minimal layout, clear typography, tech-forward styling
Homepage contains a structured blog layout section (e.g., featured posts + latest posts) appropriate for guest posting

requirements.text: Add a prominent call-to-action button immediately after the hero section with the label “Lifestyle” that links to https://zeekly.co.uk/ and opens in the same tab; the button must feel native to the site design (not ad-like) while remaining visually noticeable, clean, and professional.

quotes: After the hero section, add a prominent call-to-action button. The button text should be “Lifestyle” and it should link to https://zeekly.co.uk/ . The button should look natural within the design (not like an advertisement) and match the modern tech style of the website... opening in the same tab.

acceptanceCriteria: A button labeled exactly “Lifestyle” appears directly after the hero section
Clicking the button navigates to https://zeekly.co.uk/ in the same browser tab (no target="_blank")
Button styling matches the site’s modern tech theme and does not resemble an advertisement

requirements.text: Implement core blog navigation and pages for a structured publishing experience: a posts listing view and a post detail view, pre-populated with sample content covering tech articles, digital innovation, software guides, startup insights, and trending technology news.

quotes: The main purpose of the site is to publish high-quality tech articles, digital innovation content, software guides, startup insights, and trending technology news.

acceptanceCriteria: Users can browse a list of posts and open a post detail page within the site
The UI includes clear post metadata presentation (e.g., title, excerpt, date, category/section)
Sample posts cover the requested topic areas (innovation, software guides, startups, tech news)

requirements.text: Add a minimal backend content API for posts so the frontend can fetch post lists and individual post details from the Internet Computer canister (single Motoko actor), using a simple data model suitable for blog publishing.

quotes: The main purpose of the site is to publish high-quality tech articles... and trending technology news.

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes query methods to fetch a list of posts and fetch a single post by identifier
Frontend loads posts via the backend actor and renders list + detail views
The solution stays within a single Motoko main actor (no additional backend services)

requirements.text: Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) appropriate for a modern technology publication and enforce it consistently across Zeekly pages and components.

quotes: The design should look modern, clean, and professional, with a strong tech-oriented visual identity. Use a minimal layout, clear typography...

acceptanceCriteria: A consistent design system is evident across navigation, hero, post cards, and post detail layout
Theme avoids default/unstyled appearance and remains clean and professional
Typography hierarchy (headings/body/meta) is clearly defined and consistent

constraints: Use English for all user-facing UI text.

Do not edit files in frontend immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in backend/main.mo); only add backend/migration.mo if an upgrade/state migration is actually needed.
The “Lifestyle” CTA must open in the same tab (do not use target="_blank").
nonGoals: Do not add third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is allowed, and it is not required for this scope).
Do not integrate external databases or third-party CMS services.
Do not implement real-time features (WebSockets/chat/push notifications).
Do not add payments or subscription functionality.

required: Zeekly wordmark logo in a modern tech style (zeekly-wordmark.dim_1200x300.png)
